name: Queen Ceiba Law
description:
Dedicated to Queen Ceiba

You give us life, to you we pledge:
No stumps or debris left behind, no felling of young trees, and to use every log to its fullest potential

properties.Title: Stump creation
properties.UserDescription: Taxes citizen (or employee of a company) 10 euro for every stump created

Left.contextDescription: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.

properties.Title: Debris creation
properties.UserDescription: Taxes citizen (or employee of a company) 0.2 euro for every piece of debris created

Person.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

Count.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

LeftNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

User.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

LeftNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Target.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

properties.Title: stump Removal
properties.UserDescription: Pays citizen (or employee of a company) 10 euro for every stump destroyed

properties.Title: Debris removal
properties.UserDescription:
Pays citizen (or employee of a company) 0.2 euro for every piece of debris cleared

Clearing debris is allowed on all properties ignoring access rules

properties.Title: Assulting Ceiba
properties.UserDescription:
Citizens (or employees) are chared an additional 10 euro per tree felled if in the past 24 hours they created more stumps or debris than they cleared.

Before charging the additional tax it first sends out a warning that the additional tax is taxed

properties.Message: Please remove created stumps and debris or you will be additional taxed

properties.Title: Pleasing Ceiba
properties.UserDescription: Every 24 hours citizen (or employee) is payed 1 euro for every tree planted with a max of 50 euro
